item.title: Chess
item.description: A basic implementation of chess written in C++14. It uses a mixture of bitboards and 0x88 with most information gathered from Chess Programming Wiki. The AI uses minimax with alpha-beta pruning plus an opening book. There is definitely room for improvements wrt. gameplay, performance and presentation. There is also a short video of it running on an Android phone using Vulkan. Requires WebGL2. Controls Use left mouse button to select / deselect a piece.
